name: div
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Purpose-Built Protection : Designed for safe, comfortable slides w/ abrasion-resistant palm zone for targeted coverage & support
Removable Wrist Insert: Customize your wrist angle for optimal comfort
Adjustable Wrist Stays: Allows you to choose your level or protection
Moisture Management : Nike Dri-FIT technology keeps your hand dry by wicking sweat away
Custom Fit : Removable wrist stay and adjustable wrist insert allow for personalized protection & fit
Dual Hand Design : Can be worn on either hand for versatility
Durable Construction : Made from a blend of neoprene, aluminum alloy, polypropylene, nylon, & polyester
